10 Techniques to Understand Code You Don‚Äôt Know - Jonathan Boccara

As a developer, you must spend more time reading code that writing code, don‚Äôt you?

Being able to quickly make sense of a piece of code you don‚Äôt know, whether when discovering a codebase, performing a code review, or reading code you wrote a while ago, is an extra-useful skill to have in your daily work.
